page.title: 08 Country Dancing
page.content:
Country dancing is very interesting. We are a part of the Welsh Folk Dancing Society. We practice with music and we have to listen carefully to the beats. Later we have to do the dance to music a few times. We have a teacher called Mrs. Francis who helps us learn the dances properly. When we have learnt all the dances we sometimes go to other schools and dance with them. Once a year Gwent schools join together in Cwmbran Town Centre to dance. We all wear Welsh costumes.The girls wear a white blouse, black and grey skirt, red becum and a white lace pinny. The boys white shirts, black waistcoats, and black trousers.
Written by Oakfield Country Dancing Club
